entry.title: $2500 // Brand ~~~~~##~~~new bathroom with a tub that is bubble worthy.
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1.5 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Kosciuszko St, Central Av. Beautiful 1 bedroom duplex apartment with a big open basement. A hop and a skip to the train and you are on your way. Spacious, well lit apartment with windows in rooms! All new fixtures and appliances. Brand new bathroom with a tub that is bubble worthy. If you didn't know : Tadeusz Kosciuszko was a polish born military leader. He fought many battles in his homeland and also in the American revolutionary war. .

Call or text Mike: show contact info

AMENITIES
Hardwood floors
High Ceilings
Central A/C
Laundry in building

Granite countertops

Built in microwave
Cats ok
Small dogs ok
